Overview
Super-soft cotton and a relaxed V-neckline make T-shirt from Club Room an ideal choice for casual style and comfort. Superfine liquid cotton fabrication gives life to this tee. Its breathable materil allows it to be worm year-round for a multitude of occasions.

C-IN2 Core Low Rise Brief

Bought 3 of these all-cotton. T's in clay red, light grey, and blue wing. Very happy with colors and softness of fabric. Ordered XL for a loose fit on my closer-to-large frame, and after washing and machine drying. that seems to have turned out well. Couldn't resist low, low sale pricing.

Written by Alex from Chicago / Mar XX, 20XX
